entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over the Cypress Hills. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023
